\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{luafonts}
\pagestyle{empty}

\special{g2umapline=tfm:pzdr/a13,270C}
\special{g2umapline=tfm:pzdr/a14,270D}
\special{g2umapline=tfm:pzdr/a15,270E}

\ExplSyntaxOn
\def\putcharlist#1#2#3#4{%
    \bgroup
        \font\testfont=#1\relax \testfont
        \int_step_function:nnnN{#2}{#3}{#4}\symbol
        \par
    \egroup
    }
\ExplSyntaxOff

\begin{document}

\font\testfont=pzdr \testfont
\putcharlist{pzdr}{36}{1}{38}

\end{document}
